name: Get the ghosts out !
description:
Your mansion is invaded by ghosts.
Armed with your grandma's shotgun, repel them while avoiding destroying the family home.

Get the ghosts out is a scoring shooter game.
You have less than two minutes to kill as many ghosts as possible by shooting them and earn the maximum points. Unfortunately, the shotgun is inaccurate and destroying furniture costs you a lot of points. Keep the click before release to gain accuracy.

Enjoy! :)
